segment.source: How to Disable or Modify Disconnected Operation Mode Settings
segment.target: How to Disable or Modify Disconnected Operation Mode Settings

segment.source: How to Disable or Modify Disconnected Operation Mode Settings
segment.target: How to Disable or Modify Disconnected Operation Mode Settings

segment.source: How to Disable or Modify Disconnected Operation Mode Settings
segment.target: How to Disable or Modify Disconnected Operation Mode Settings

segment.source: Use the following procedures in Application Virtualization Client to disable or modify disconnected operation mode settings.
segment.target: Use the following procedures in Application Virtualization Client to disable or modify disconnected operation mode settings.

segment.source: To disable disconnected operation
segment.target: To disable disconnected operation

segment.source: Right-click the Application Virtualization node in the console, and select Properties from the pop-up menu.
segment.target: Right-click the Application Virtualization node in the console, and select Properties from the pop-up menu.

segment.source: Click the Connectivity tab, and then clear Allow disconnected operation check box.
segment.target: Click the Connectivity tab, and then clear Allow disconnected operation check box.

segment.source: Click OK to accept the change.
segment.target: Click OK to accept the change.

segment.source: To change the time-out
segment.target: To change the time-out

segment.source: Right-click the Application Virtualization node in the console, and select Properties from the pop-up menu.
segment.target: Right-click the Application Virtualization node in the console, and select Properties from the pop-up menu.

segment.source: Click the Connectivity tab, and then select the Limit disconnected operation to check box.
segment.target: Click the Connectivity tab, and then select the Limit disconnected operation to check box.

segment.source: In the field, enter a value from 1–999999 (representing days).
segment.target: In the field, enter a value from 1–999999 (representing days).

segment.source: The default value is 90 days.
segment.target: The default value is 90 days.

segment.source: Click OK to accept the change.
segment.target: Click OK to accept the change.

segment.source: To work offline
segment.target: To work offline

segment.source: Right-click the Application Virtualization node in the console, and select Properties from the pop-up menu.
segment.target: Right-click the Application Virtualization node in the console, and select Properties from the pop-up menu.

segment.source: Click the Connectivity tab, and then select the Work offline check box.
segment.target: Click the Connectivity tab, and then select the Work offline check box.

segment.source: Click OK to accept the change.
segment.target: Click OK to accept the change.
